title: Prostate Cancer: In Depth Understanding,EDA ,Model
description: About this NotebookI have always seen that Kaggle competitions require a lot of domain knowledge and the main problems of a Kaggle beginner is not lack of Machine learning Knowledge but more often than not it is lack of domain knowledge.There are always a lot of great kernels regarding different ways of solving the problems but only a few handful address the problems of domain knowledge and getting started. In this notebook , I will start with complete explanation of everything you need know related to Prostate Cancer and its detection and I will built on that to explain the dataset,perform EDA and then Build a baseline model This kernel will be a work in Progress,and I will keep on updating it as the competition progresses and I learn more and more things about the data If you find this kernel useful, Please consider Upvoting it , it motivates me to write more Quality content
